alert.note: Alert for Burke (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 09 at 1:47PM EST until January 09 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 5 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN EAST CENTRAL GEORGIA BURKE IN SOUTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 17 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL SOUTH CAROLINA AIKEN BAMBERG BARNWELL CALHOUN CHESTERFIELD CLARENDON EDGEFIELD FAIRFIELD KERSHAW LANCASTER LEE LEXINGTON NEWBERRY ORANGEBURG RICHLAND SALUDA SUMTER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AIKEN, BAMBERG, BARNWELL, BATESBURG-LEESVILLE, BISHOPVILLE, BLACKVILLE, BROOKDALE, CAMDEN, CAYCE, CHERAW, COLUMBIA, DENMARK, EDGEFIELD, ELGIN, ELGIN, JOHNSTON, LANCASTER, LANCASTER MILL, LEXINGTON, LUGOFF, MANNING, MURPHYS ESTATES, NEWBERRY, NORTH AUGUSTA, OAK GROVE, ORANGEBURG, PAGELAND, RED BANK, RIDGE SPRING, SALUDA, SEVEN OAKS, SPRINGDALE, ST. MATTHEWS, SUMMERTON, SUMTER, WAYNESBORO, WEST COLUMBIA, WILLISTON, WINNSBORO, AND WINNSBORO MILLS.
